item.title: How to Run R Stats Directly in Jupyter Notebook Locally
item.description: Motivation Around 2010, I begun my data science journey with R, after Python. Now days I spend more time in Python, but I am thinking to change my workflow. So, I am trying a new approach. Regarding data analysis, people spend most of their time running R R-Studio and Python in Jupyter (jupyter-lab or jupyter-notebook). Note: For programming and any other job, as type a text, notes, etc, I work in Emacs.
